data.expected_result: The tooltip rightfully says that you cannot edit because its above your highest role.
data.short_description: The tooltip text when hovering over role colours for roles above your own (non-server owner) has the wrong text.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you are NOT server owner and have Manage Roles. - Go to the role options in Server Settings > Roles. - Click a role above your own that you cannot edit. - Hover over the colours and observe.
